name: Jesse Eisenberg
summary: Jesse Eisenberg. Actor: The Social Network. Curly haired and with a fast-talking voice, Jesse Eisenberg is a movie actor, known for his Academy Award nominated role as Mark Zuckerberg in the 2010 film The Social Network. He has also starred in the films The Squid and the Whale, Adventureland, The Education of Charlie Banks, 30 Minutes or Less, Now You See Me and Zombieland. Additionally, he played Lex Luthor in...
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar | 22 wins & 60 nominations total
